message: Ngh...
...What's that smell...
It smells familiar, like some kind of spice...
Cinnamon...?
Slowly opening my eyes, I see someone standing a short distance away.
The giant. What was his name? Mink?
What is he doing?
He's gazing solemnly at a burning candle.
Is he saying something?
I can't make it out.
I wonder what he's saying...
What is...
...he doing...
I wake, once again, with a splitting headache.
I open my eyes to a cracked, filthy ceiling.
...Where am I? What happened?
...Right. They were about to rape me.
What happened after that? I'm fully dressed...
At any rate, this looks like a different room.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Owwww..."

I have to take my medicine...<K>
Wait, my bag.
Where'd my bag go? Ren was in there.
I heard the door open and bolt out of bed, momentarily forgetting the pain.
Who is it? Mink?

name: 電話の人
message: "You're awake."
A gangly, slouching man pokes his head through the rusty metal door.
When he sees me, he grins and enters the room.
Who the hell?

name: 電話の人
message: "How you feeling? You've had it rough, huh?"

name: 電話の人
message: "It's nothing personal. No one can defy Mink's orders. Not that we have any idea what he's thinking."
I have no idea what the man's on about. I glare at him, willing him to go away.

name: 電話の人
message: "Don't look so scared. I'm not here on Mink's order. You're... Aoba, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "How do you know my name?!"

name: 電話の人
message: "I knew it. You're Aoba from Hum-Drum Junk."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You know Hum-Drum Junk?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Yeah. I used to be a pretty regular customer."
He smiles happily.
Maybe it's just because of what I've been through, but the shop's name is music to my ears.
Knowing he was a customer makes me feel a certain kinship. I want to drop my guard.
But I don't.
There's something off about this guy.
He can't seem to sit still. And that's not all...

name: 電話の人
message: "I can't believe I ran into you here! I'm so excited to finally meet you!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "O-Oh, yeah?"

name: 電話の人
message: "I know, right? So, like, when I heard we were holding you, I had a brilliant idea."

name: 電話の人
message: "What if I let you go?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Are you serious?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Of course I am. So what do you say? Good idea or what?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But... isn't this place crawling with that Mink guy's people?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Don't sweat it. I'll come up with something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You'll come up with something... Like what, specifically?"

name: 電話の人
message: "I said don't worry about it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, but what are you gonna do?"

name: 電話の人
message: "...You don't know when to quit."

name: 電話の人
message: "I told you I'd handle it, didn't I?"
Suddenly, the man's expression changes, and he pulls a gun on me.
He smiles, but it doesn't reach his eyes, which are wide as plates.

name: 電話の人
message: "Look, it'll be totally fine. I'll get you out of here, so just lemme hear your voice some more. Please?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "My... voice?"

name: 電話の人
message: "Yeah! You're the one who usually answers the phone, aren't you?"

name: 電話の人
message: "I fell in love with your voice the first time I heard it. After that, I kept calling just to hear your voice again."
So his only interest in the store is me...
Admittedly, he's not the only customer who calls because of my voice.

name: 電話の人
message: "I want you to use that pretty voice for me. I wanna hear it all. Please?"
The man climbs onto the bed, gun still in hand. He shoves the weapon in my face when I try to get up.

name: 電話の人
message: "Don't move! If you try to run, I'll shoot."

name: 電話の人
message: "What's the big deal? I just wanna hear your voice. You can talk, can't you?"
The man gropes my face, panting heavily.
Ugh, gross!
Why does this keep happening to me?!
Agh! My head!
Shit. Why does it have to start up again now?!

name: 電話の人
message: "Eek!"
The door flies open. The man goes white as a sheet and spins around, dropping the gun.
There in the doorway stands Mink.

name: ミンク
message: "...What are you doing?"

name: 電話の人
message: "S-Sorry!"
Mink marches into the room and grabs the panicking man by the collar.

name: 電話の人
message: "Eeek! I'm sorry! I'm sorry!!!"

name: ミンク
message: "Get your ass over here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Ow!"
Mink grabs me by the arm and hauls me off the bed.
